productname: Vandelay® 3 Ply Surgical Mask - BFE & PFE ≥ 99.5% - UV Sterilized - 3 Layer Face Masks - CE, FDA & SITRA - Packed in Pouches of 5 (10 x Pouches)
description:
About this item
✅ MELTBLOWN FILTER: 3 Layers of Filtering Protection. Our 3 ply mask contains 3 premium layers; pp non-woven outer filter layer, melt-blown polypropylene filtration layer, and a soft absorbent pp non-woven inner filter layer. It’s the best face mask breathable to wear it when you travel through congested airports, bus terminals, malls, party, and busy city streets.
✅ UV STERILIZED: Each 3 layer mask undergoes a UV sterilization process just before they are packaged. This 3 ply face mask pack keeps you confident you won’t run out quickly. Disposable face mask for personal protection. This surgical mask is for general use and also intended for medical usage. Surgical mask 3 layer available in pack of 50, these are 10 pouches of 5 masks each, for your convenience and pleasurable usage, wearing protection masks could effectively block out dust, droplets.
✅ SOFT & BREATHABLE: Ear loop and face masks are both made with soft material that makes it perfect for long duration use. Easy to use, disposable mask covers the mouth, nose, and chin. Breathable face mask is with a built-in adjustable nose clip, just press it gently to fit the nose bridge to better seal your face. 3 ply surgical mask with adjustable ear loops for a variety of users for instant protection and adding no strains to the ears.
✅ EXPORT QUALITY: Made in India for export to USA & EU. 3ply mask designs for the utmost in comfort, these surgical masks are painless and adjustable, wearing this lightweight face mask for a long time won't create any fatigue or stress to your skin. Perfect three layer face mask for Men, Women, Indoor, and Outdoor Use.
✅ SUITABLE FOR HEALTHCARE PROFESSIONALS: The protection masks are made to the highest quality standards and are suitable for healthcare use. Disposable masks with the inner non-woven fabric are as soft as intimate clothing, light, and breathable. Our medical mask is approved by FDA. Triple layer mask can be used as medical surgical face masks.

description:
About this item
COMFORTABLE & EASY TO WEAR: Zpack protector 3 Ply masks features a contoured shape, 3D structure, nose wire and ultrasonic welded latex-free stretchable ear loops for comfortable wear thoughout the day, ensuring a secure fit for increased comfort.
HIGH FILTRATION CAPACITY: Zpack protector 3 Ply masks are designed to have a high filtration capacity whilst retaining low breathing resistance, allowing for easy and comfortable breathing for prolonged periods of time.

MULTIPURPOSE USES: Ideal for use at doctor’s clinics, hospital, dental clinics, caterers, construction areas, beauty shops, etc. by professionals & people with allergies for utmost personal care.
SMART DISPENSER PACKAGING: The masks are packaged in a smart dispenser box for everyday use at home, office, shop, cars, etc.
